message.name: ERR_PROSPECTPERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DRE_SEARCH
message.locale: This prospect person is already employed by this employer at this time.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECTPERSON_EMPLOYMENT_BIRTHDATE_STARTDATE
message.locale: A birth date has been set for this prospect person. The employment start date cannot be before this date.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECTPERSON_EMPLOYMENT_FV_EMPALTID_EMPTY
message.locale: There is no employer selected for this employment.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECTPERSON_EMPLOYMENT_FV_FROMDATE_EMPTY
message.locale: A from date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECTPERSON_EMPLOYMENT_FV_DATE_PASSED
message.locale: The end date of primary employment has passed for this prospect person.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECTPERSON_EMPLOYMENT_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_CREATE
message.locale: New employment details cannot be added for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECTPERSON_EMPLOYMENT_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_MODIFY
message.locale: Employment details of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECTPERSON_EMPLOYMENT_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_DELETE
message.locale: Employment details for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be deleted.
